titles.title: How Sweet the Name of Jesus Sounds

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How sweet the Name of Jesus sounds in a believer's ear! It soothes his sorrows, heals his wounds, and drives away his fear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It makes the wounded spirit whole, and calms the troubled breast; 'tis manna to the hungry soul, and to the weary rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Dear Name! the Rock on which I build, my Shield and Hiding Place, my never-failing Treas'ry filled with boundless stores of grace!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: By Thee my pray'rs acceptance gain, although with sin defiled; Satan accuses me in vain, and I am owned a child.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Jesus! my Shepherd, Husband, Friend, my Prophet, Priest, and King; my Lord, my Life, my Way, my End, accept the praise I bring.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Weak is the effort of my heart, and cold my warmest thought; but when I see Thee as Thou art, I'll praise Thee as I ought!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Till then I would Thy love proclaim with ev'ry fleeting breath; and may the music of Thy name refresh me soul in death.
